members.text: Python is a popular programming language. It was created by Guido van Rossum, and released in 1991.
members.speech: Python is an open-source programming language that works with a wide variety of operating systems and software to help you create applications. It has a large, robust community of users, developers and companies that make it one of the most popular languages on the planet.

members.text: Python is commonly used for developing websites and software, task automation, data analysis, and data visualization.
